abstract.para: The intended readers of this guide are developers who want to develop Collaboration functions of eXo Platform 3.5.
This guide consists of the following main content:

listitem.para: Applications: Provides the comprehensive view about Collaboration applications of eXo Platform 3.5.
Configurations: Provides the configuration of Collaboration components, external component plugins and other configurations.
JCR structure: Provides the JCR structure of each Collaboration applications.
Developer reference: Provides the knowledge about overridden components and public REST APIs implemented in Collaboration functions of eXo Platform 3.5.
